comments.body: So my only objection is why would I care about these 2 separately instead of just having a single method `OpenAPISchema` do the heavy lifting for me like it did before with just the caching added?

Because unfortunately we have two different types: `openapi.Resources` which is our own format for the openapi, and the actual openapi. Some operations require the former, some operations require the latter ðŸ˜ž

I spoke with Antoine, it seems that the disconnection between `openapi.Resource` and `openapi_v2.Document` is too big to be addressed at this time. We agree that we'll revisit that at a later time. This is good to go as soon as it gets green.
